main event: The document contains multiple UFO sightings in the St. Petersburg, Florida area, with descriptions of circular, metallic objects emitting blue-white glow and disappearing from sight, as well as a circle with blue lights around the rim and yellow or white in color.
interesting points: The sightings describe objects of various sizes and shapes, with portholes emitting light and emitting flame or exhaust trail, observed for several minutes by reliable witnesses.

One sighting occurred during the night, with a stationary object observed for 7 minutes, and another sighting involved an object traveling at a high rate of speed, estimated to be between 600-800 mph.
A witness with considerable experience in observing aircraft reported observing an object approximately 1000-1200 feet in altitude with no discernible sound.
The descriptions include sketched illustrations used by the observer to depict the objects, and some uncertainty in the observer's perception due to light distortion.
The reports recommend accepting the sightings as cases of unidentified flying objects, and no known aircraft or other explainable objects were present during the sightings.
sighted object: circular, metallic objects emitting blue-white glow, circle with blue lights around the rim, and yellow or white object
witnesses: reliable observers including a control tower operator and a male resident
